headline: Aptiv to Release Second Quarter 2025 Financial Results
summary: SCHAFFHAUSEN - Aptiv PLC will release its second quarter 2025 financial results on July 31, 2025 and will hold an investor call the same day at 8:00 a.m. ET.The call will be hosted by Aptiv's Chair...
